title: Runner's Yoga - Yoga With Adriene
description:
Yoga For Runner's - or joggers, or brisk walkers. This practice offers great release and rehab after a good run or cardio. Also, a wonderful practice to repeat to up or maintain your running or cardio game. 

This sequence stays low to the ground. Use the breath to stretch and soothe the muscles of the body, stabilize the joints, and Find What Feels Good. This 30 min practice uses the principles of yoga to cultivate balance and find ease. Thirty minutes of practice to allow, release, balance, and restore!

Want more yoga for runners? Check out this Yoga for Runners playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLui6Eyny-UzzoiewtypZsiw2OIUz2btnD

- - - - - - - - - -

channelDescription:
WELCOME to Yoga With Adriene! Our mission is to connect as many people as possible through high-quality free yoga videos. 
We welcome all levels, all bodies, all genders, all souls!
If you're brand-new to yoga, check out my Yoga For Beginners and Foundations of Yoga series. These are designed to give you the tools to build a happy, healthy at-home yoga practice. 
Do your best, be authentic, and FIND WHAT FEELS GOOD.
Jump on in! You don't even have to leave your house. 

Love, Adriene

comments: Community check in! Where in the world are you practicing today?
Great start to Saturday morning! Thankyou, Adriene xx

AWAKEN 🦋 | April 12, 2025 | I'm not a runner, and I wouldn't call myself a fierce walker 😆 but I do walk. At least I used to before my four legged walking buddy left us last summer. Since then I've been struggling to get walking again by myself, it's just not the same. But now as the winter is finally loosening its grip on us, I'm determined to get back to it. I probably should have saved this for after my walk today, but I had already rolled out the mat when I realized and I'm sure it's going to make my walk that much sweeter. It really was such a treat today, getting into those hips and the low back too. Loved it! 🙏

Tried to talk myself out of this practice this morning, but found the strength to conquer it!!! Glad I did
Day 12 explore 2025
We are One
🙏🏼

Awaken day 12! I’ve been uncovering some trauma this evening and this practice came at the perfect moment. That hip release was something else. I’m very grateful for this practice💕
Thank you, Adriene and YWA community🧡🧡🧡
